channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Defense Ministry Spots 45 Chinese Aircraft, 6 Vessels in Taiwan Strait
item.description: Taiwan's defense ministry has reported 45 Chinese aircraft and six vessels operating around Taiwan, just a week before Taiwan inaugurates its new president on May 20th. Correctio

item.title: Taiwan To Raise Tobacco Tax for Cancer Prevention
item.description: Taiwan is set to raise its tobacco tax to help cover its new national cancer prevention and control plan.

item.title: Taiwan's Highland Ecosystems Vulnerable to Climate Change
item.description: Scientists say Taiwan's mountain ecosystems are especially vulnerable to climate change. The country's temperatures are rising faster than the global average, and conservationists
